title: Leaverbuster false penalty?
body: I just recently got a 5 game penalty for the priority Que because my power went out due to storms for around 2-3 hours. I come back on as soon as it comes back up and i have this penalty for something I can't control? Why is that?

replies.body:
I definitely understand where you are coming from, especially since power going out is something that isn't in your control at all.  Keep in mind that we never punish for a single leave, and it seems like this is the 2nd DC after creating a fairly new account.  Punishments are much stricter on low level accounts due to the fact that we want players to understand that leaving games is definitely not ok.

As long as you don't experience any other random acts of God, you should be good to go!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
Yeah, Houston has had some really bad storms as off lately, Dont know why it went off today, guess past storm damage, but is it possible to get this removed?
Can't make any changes to the punishment I'm afraid :(  You'll have to play it out and then you'll be good to go.
